column4: I have a AR5008 series WiFi card and for some reason it disconnect from time to time and have to do modprobe -r ath9k and modprob ath9k to reload it, does anyone know how to solve this problem?
i did that but didn't help
what do you mean it didn't help.  You mean to say that there was nothing useful in the logs?  No notofications?  Nothing?
